title: Recognize the Standard Equation of Circle
text: The equation is in the form of $${\left(x-h\right)}^2+{\left(y-k\right)}^2=r^2$$ which is the standard form of a circle with center at (h,k). In this case $$r=3$$. Therefore the equation represents the circle centered at (2,3) with radius 3.\n##figure1.gif##
